name: Witches Also Play Dice
description:
This is an auto battler game, in which you get gold by rolling dice and lose minions if you roll a 1. 

Controls: mouse.

Short tutorial:

  1. Your minions will fight taking turns, you don't have to do anything, just watch
  2. You roll a dice for as long as you want and get gold based on how much you rolled. HOWEVER, if you roll a 1, one of your minions die
  3. You spend that gold to get more minions or powerups
